summary:
- The script implements a version management system for Python projects using Git as the VCS. It provides a set of functions to extract, parse and generate  ​  ​  ​  ​  ​  ​  ​  ​  ​  ​  ​  ​  ​  ​  ​ ​  ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​​  ​ ​ ​​ ​ ​​ ​ ​​ ​​ ​​ ​​ ​​ ​ ​​ ​​ ​​​ ​​ ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ 

We need to produce a summary of the functionality of the code, focusing on business logic, inputs, outputs, in Chinese (or Chinese/English). Must start directly with the summary content, no "This code does..." etc.

The code is a versioneer implementation. It defines functions for extracting version info from git, from parent directory, from keywords, etc. It registers VCS handlers, runs commands, parses git describe output, renders version strings in various styles (pep440, git-describe, etc.). The main entry point is get_versions() which returns a dict with version, full-revisionid, dirty flag, error, date.

Also includes LONG_VERSION_PY and SHORT_VERSION
